input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response A: This garden mount weathervane from Good Directions is not only functional, but it's also a stylish decoration for your outdoor space. The flag design is made of 14 gauge steel and finished with an antique copper coating that will age beautifully over time. The sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement, so you can always know which way the wind is blowing. This weathervane comes with a 60 in. mounting rod so you can easily install it in your garden.
input_text.Response B: Our Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is a unique and elegant addition to any home or garden. It is constructed from heavy-duty 14 gauge steel for long-lasting durability, and features an antique copper finish for a timeless look. The sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure smooth and effortless movement in even the slightest of breezes, making it ideal for providing highly accurate weather forecasts. This model also includes a 60 in. mounting rod for easy setup and installation. Our Garden Mount Weathervane is the perfect way to add a touch of old-world charm and beauty to your home or garden!

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
